readable.content: A man in a red baseball cap eats a chip . a man wearing a red hat has a potato chip in his mouth A man wearing sunglasses and a red cap putting a chip in his mouth . A man wearing sunglasses and a red hat is opening his mouth wide and eating a chip . A man with sunglasses on puts a chip in his mouth .
